Wisdom: كَذَبَ مَنِ ادَّعَى الْيَقِينَ بِالْبَاقِي وَهُوَ مُوَاصِلٌ لِلْفَانِي
enWisdom: He who claims [to have] certitude in the eternal while he is still attached to the transient, has lied

Wisdom: مَنْ أَيْقَنَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَمْ يَحْرِصْ عَلَى الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: One who is certain about the Hereafter does not covet this world

Wisdom: مَنْ أَيْقَنَ [آمَنَ‏] بِالْآخِرَةِ أَعْرَضَ عَنِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: One who is certain about the Hereafter turns away from this world

Wisdom: مَنْ أَيْقَنَ بِالْآخِرَةِ سَلَا عَنِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: One who is certain about his Hereafter thinks no more of this world
One who longs [for Allah] forgets [this world]

Wisdom: اشْتِغَالُ النَّفْسِ بِمَا لَا يَصْحَبُهَا بَعْدَ الْمَوْتِ مِنْ أَكْثَرِ [أَكْبَرِ] الْوَهْنِ
enWisdom: Busying oneself with that which will not accompany you after death is from the greatest weakness
